an1.61-70:4.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to wholesome qualities, or makes unwholesome qualities decline like arousing energy.
an1.61-70:4.2: When you’re energetic, wholesome qualities arise, and unwholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:7.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to unwholesome qualities, or makes wholesome qualities decline like having many wishes.
an1.61-70:7.2: When you have many wishes, unwholesome qualities arise, and wholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:10.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to wholesome qualities, or makes unwholesome qualities decline like having few wishes.
an1.61-70:10.2: When you have few wishes, wholesome qualities arise, and unwholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:13.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to unwholesome qualities, or makes wholesome qualities decline like discontent.
an1.61-70:13.2: When you’re discontented, unwholesome qualities arise, and wholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:16.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to wholesome qualities, or makes unwholesome qualities decline like contentment.
an1.61-70:16.2: When you’re contented, wholesome qualities arise, and unwholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:19.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to unwholesome qualities, or makes wholesome qualities decline like focusing your mind in the wrong way.
an1.61-70:19.2: When you focus your mind in the wrong way, unwholesome qualities arise, and wholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:22.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to wholesome qualities, or makes unwholesome qualities decline like focusing your mind in the right way.
an1.61-70:22.2: When you focus your mind in the right way, wholesome qualities arise, and unwholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:25.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to unwholesome qualities, or makes wholesome qualities decline like lack of situational awareness.
an1.61-70:25.2: When you lack situational awareness, unwholesome qualities arise, and wholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:28.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to wholesome qualities, or makes unwholesome qualities decline like situational awareness.
an1.61-70:28.2: When you have situational awareness, unwholesome qualities arise, and wholesome qualities decline.”
an1.61-70:31.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that gives rise to unwholesome qualities, or makes wholesome qualities decline like bad friends.
an1.61-70:31.2: When you have bad friends, unwholesome qualities arise, and wholesome qualities decline.”
